items.sentence: Tom usually wears a wetsuit when he goes surfing.
Tom walked across the room and opened the window.
Tom walked over to Mary and whispered in her ear.
I hope that you don\'t mind that I let myself in.
I just came by to tell you I\'m moving to Boston.
I just can\'t get used to taking orders from Tom.
Tom sprained his ankle, but he\'s going to be OK.
Tom swore that he didn\'t tell anyone our secret.
Almost every person in this country is bilingual.
I never could figure out why Tom didn\'t like me.
Mary said she didn\'t want any of us to help Tom.
Tom should be able to change the tire by himself.
Tom should be able to help Mary tomorrow morning.
Tom should definitely go visit Mary next weekend.
I don\'t want you to do anything or say anything.
I don\'t know why Tom wanted me to be here today.
I don\'t practice the piano as often as I should.
I don\'t speak French as well as you think I can.
I don\'t think Tom will be in Boston next summer.
Tomorrow I\'m going to give my old guitar to Tom.
